Metadata.title: Protecio - Cybersecurity, Data Protection and IT Governance Solutions
Metadata.description: Protecio offers innovative solutions in cybersecurity, data protection, and data governance. We provide artificial intelligence, data masking, disaster recovery, and cybersecurity audit services. Optimize your IT operations and ensure regulatory compliance with Protecio.O
Metadata.keywords: Protecio, cybersecurity, data protection, data governance, regulatory compliance, artificial intelligence, IT solutions, data masking, data classification, disaster recovery, cloud services, cybersecurity audit, virtual CIO, MS Purview, Azure, GCP, AWS, USAII AI Leader

Hero.title: What is Protecio, <guidelines>how we can help</guidelines>
Hero.description: Protecio is a company dedicated to providing innovative, safe and efficient technological solutions for its customers.

SolutionIA.title: AI Solution – USAII AI Leader Certified

Vision.title: Our vision at Protecio
Vision.description: To be a transformation player of choice for startups, SMEs and large organizations through high-quality, secure, efficient and affordable products and services.

Cta.title: If you have any questions or need help, at any time

Footer.infos: Protecio is a company dedicated to providing innovative solutions in privacy, cybersecurity and data governance.

hero.title: Cloud <guidelines>Professional</guidelines> Services
hero.description: Strategic Consulting, GCP Exploration, Modernization Framework, Cloud Adoption Measurement, FinOp

Offres.offre1: Cybersecurity, compliance & IT audit and diagnosis
Offres.offre3: Governance and optimization of cloud services – costs and security
Offres.offre4: Integration of data governance, compliance and cybersecurity solutions
Offres.offre5: Support for start-up and execution of IT and cybersecurity programs

ConseilStrategique.title: Strategic advice
ConseilStrategique.liste:
• Participate in or lead workshops
  • Align requirements with the best IT practices in the market
  • Deliver high-quality results quickly by following the agile model
  • Respond to the needs of the Cloud CoE
  • Coordinate with departments, CoEs, and enterprise architecture
  • Develop centers of excellence
  • Optimize governance

FrameworkDeModernisation.title: Modernization Framework
FrameworkDeModernisation.liste:
• Closure of data centers (On-Prem to AVS) in progress - Prepare for AVS exit
  • Requirement gathering
  • Guide for modernization
  • Prioritize SaaS, PaaS, or CaaS
  • Standardize services to support modernization (mapping)
  • Migration path (decision tree)
  • Reference architecture

MesureAdoptionInfonuagique.title: Cloud Adoption Measurement
MesureAdoptionInfonuagique.liste:
• Identification of KPIs
  • Process review
  • Data collection
  • Reports
  • Performance tracking
  • Align roles and responsibilities
  • Follow-up on actions based on performance

FinOp.title: FinOps
FinOp.liste:
• Optimize and extend the process
  • Establish a FinOps culture
  • Accountability
  • AI coverage
  • Azure, GCP, AWS coverage and SaaS exploration

Loi25.title: Solution for the protection of personal information (law 25)
Loi25.liste:
• Data masking solution
    • Datamask on Google Chrome, MS Purview classification solution
    • Accelerator for MS Purview data leakage prevention solution
    • Accelerator for disaster recovery solution on Azure, GCP, and AWS

Mission.title: Our mission
Mission.mission1: To offer high-quality services and products in compliance with best practices in terms of IT, cybersecurity and the client's capabilities
Mission.mission2: To establish a flexible and personalized partnership model for the client, including risk sharing, fixed price and on-demand services.

hero.title: Feel free to write to us!
hero.description: We will be happy to discuss your needs and find the best solution for you together. Contact us today and let's move your ideas forward!

Success.title: Thank you!
